titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the David Davidson slide collection, 1956-1962 UA 440
titlestmt.author: Norie Guthrie

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored onsite at the Woodson Research Center in the mini-UA collections.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-04-02 13:47:32 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.abstract: This collection consists of slides taken by David Davidson '57, '58 during his time as a student at Rice Institute.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: David Davidson attended the Rice Institute in the 1950s graduating in 1957 and 1958 with a degree in Mechanial Engineering. He also received an MS/PhD in 1968. While an undergrad, he participated in The Engineering Society, American Society of Mechanical Engineers, Rally Club, Alpha Phi Omega, and ROTC.
He went on to work at Southwest Research Institute in San Antonio, TX.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains slides that showcase Rice Institute buildings, events, and student life.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research. Stored onsite at the Woodson Research Center in the mini-UA collections.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from this material must be obtained from the Woodson Reserach Center.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: David Davidson slide collection, 1956-1962, UA 440, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains slides of a homecoming bonfire, exteriors and interiors of campus buildings, Rondelet, commencement, an electron beam melter, Rice's 50th anniversary, student elections, and construction of campus buildings.
